scripts.build:html_public: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('html_public')){fs.rmSync('html_public',{recursive:true});}fs.cpSync('out','html_public',{recursive:true});console.log('✓ Output copied to html_public');"
scripts.build:root: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const outputDir=path.join('..','html_public');if(fs.existsSync(outputDir)){fs.rmSync(outputDir,{recursive:true});}fs.cpSync('out',outputDir,{recursive:true});console.log('✓ Output copied to repo root/html_public');"
